message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $150?
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $110?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a profit. How about we meet in the middle at $130?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $130 is still a bit too high. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $115?
I'm not willing to go much lower than $130, but I can try to meet you halfway again. How about $125?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $125 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
